        public boolean doTrial()
        Description copied from class: MCMove
        Method to perform trial move. Returns false if the trial could not be attempted, for example if there were no molecules in the box and the trial is designed to displace an atom; returns true otherwise.

      • getA

        public double getA()
        Description copied from class: MCMove
        Returns the temperature-independent part of the acceptance probability. The actual acceptance probility is calculated as max(1,A*exp(-B/T)) where T is the IntegratorBox's temperature.
        Specified by:
        getA in class MCMove

      • getB

        public double getB()
        Description copied from class: MCMove
        Returns the temperature-dependent part of the acceptance probability. The actual acceptance probility is calculated as max(1,A*exp(-B/T)) where T is the IntegratorBox's temperature.
        Specified by:
        getB in class MCMove

      • rejectNotify

        public void rejectNotify()
        Description copied from class: MCMove
        Method called by IntegratorMC in the event that the most recent trial move is rejected. This method should cause the system to be restored to the condition before the most recent call to doTrial.
        Specified by:
        rejectNotify in class MCMove
